name: alienly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is strange and not familiar: The style of his writing is alienly impersonal. I found her strangely and alienly beautiful.
in a way that relates to a different place, country, race, group, etc., or to creatures from a different planet: He believes that cows do not think alienly, they just do not think at all. The robot turned its alienly unreadable face towards us.
More examplesFewer examplesHe found himself in an alienly beautiful landscape.She seemed alienly British when I spotted her waiting for me in the airport.
